2024501.name: Deranged
2024501.desc: Allies of this type are inflicted with Confuse and can not tell teammates and enemies apart.

2024502.name: Deranged
2024502.desc: Allies of this type are prohibitied from attacking.

2024503.name: Deranged
2024503.desc: For Mods of this type, increases their ATK by 1000%.

2024504.name: Deranged
2024504.desc: For Mods of this type, using Dodge will teleport them to a random spot on the field.

2024506.name: Deranged
2024506.desc: When Mods of this type deal damage, they lose all Combat Resources.

2024507.name: Deranged
2024507.desc: Enemies defeated by this type of damage will become allies.
